---
title: "Sources"
---

The project uses a dataset from the UN Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD) and the World Bank, covering country-level statistics and indicators on the digital economy, particularly in developing countries.

### Dataset
- **Title**: Digital Economy and Technology
- **Source**: World Bank Data360
- **Link**: [View Dataset](https://data360.worldbank.org/en/dataset/UNCTAD_DE)
